desc: First ever pillow to incorporate physical therapy techniques (Craniosacral therapy techniques – OCBR, CV4, EV4) to relieve neck pain and induce proper sleep positions. Keeping your neck, spine, and shoulders truly aligned in proper resting position while sleeping on the side through 15 years of R&D.

layout.text: Designed by a Physical Therapist to help patients live free of neck pain with over 15 years of professional experience
